title: Heroin Hurricane Katrina and the Howling Within
description: When Hurricane Katrina bore down on the city of New Orleans, I did not even consider leaving. The reason was simple, really- I did not have enough heroin to leave without facing the impending doom of withdrawal. Come walk with me, through the waist-deep flood water surrounding the neighborhoods in the heart of New Orleans. Feel the water sloshing in your shoes, ducking down darkened alleys, searching the desolation for my next fix.
author: Eliza Player
